function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Visits to green spaces potentially contribute to the spread of contagious diseases like COVID-19.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission in crowded green spaces.","Mitigation":"Enforcement of social distancing and mask-wearing in green spaces, regular disinfection of common surfaces.","Technologies":"Contactless payment systems, automatic hand sanitizer dispensers in public areas.","People":"City residents, visitors to green spaces.","Owner":"Local government, park management."}]}
